summary: Desi Arnaz greets the "I Love Lucy" studio audience and invites them to watch Lucille Ball and the cast film a special extended episode.
cast: Lucille Ball|Desi Arnaz|Vivian Vance|William Frawley|Ann Doran|Mary Wickes|Barbara Pepper|Erze Ivan|Benny Baker|Frank J. Scannell|Roy Rowan|Bennett Green|Aubrey Lee Dale|Wilbur Hatch|Hazel Pierce

title: I Love Lucy
